urls.title: Experts share tips for tackling plastic pollution in Portsmouth
urls.description: Online workshop encourages local people to stamp out avoidable plastic waste.

text:
We ran a workshop with @portsmouthuni for local groups looking at ideas on behaviour change on disposing of plastics.

Experts believe around 10 mill tonnes of plastic waste enters the ocean each year, which is equivalent to a bin lorry load every minute. https://t.co/Ge1UbZYHsX https://t.co/spDtstZVTH

@kramsivrup @jhhtw1 @thameswater @pow_rebecca @EnvAgency @River_Crane1 @LBRuT_Help Yes, going on relentlessly all over the country, to compensate for a failing infrastructure. Urgently needs sorting out.

It should be that the @EnvAgency monitors these routine events. The @EnvAgency is judged unfit for purpose in part due to ‚Äúcatastrophic‚Äù reductions in funding (2020).
